title: Hey anyone from the Riot team?
body:
Guys I restarted playing LOL after around and about a year of not playing.
When I logged on for the first time in and I launched the game search I was told to wait 20min due to leaverbuster.
I want to know is there anyway I can get this lifted. i mean it was more than a year ago
I did submit a Support ticket aswell.

replies.body: I pulled up your account to see if there was anything we might be able to help with, but it doesn't actually look like you have any punishments right now? Let me know if you're still seeing that message so we can look into it for ya!
